channel.title: How to edit flash with macromedia flash 8?
channel.description: Does any one know of any tutorials on how to edit flash websites on macromedia flash 8? Cuz I got a flash site from www.templatemonster.com and need to edit it.

item.title: How to edit flash with macromedia flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Un-editable .SWF? Have you been living under a rock for the last 10 years? There are 2034723095203842309482309482309 flash decompilers out there that can fully decompile and edit flash without Macromedia

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit flash with macromedia flash 8?

item.title: How to edit flash with macromedia flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

The compress un-editable file is .SWF and the editable file is .FLA and the only way to edit flash from other places is to get a .SWF converter that can convert to .FLAs.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit flash with macromedia flash 8?

item.title: How to edit flash with macromedia flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Flash 8 is the available one to create your own flash files.

If you litterally want to edit already made flashâ€™s, then what you are looking for is a Flash Decompiler which will convert the .swf file to a .fla file and you can open it via Flash 8.

Read full topic
